website_summaries.verdict: A socket wrench with two rotating heads that are designed to fit 48 different nut and bolt heads.
pros: The clever design of this pass-through socket wrench allows you to quickly change the socket size, making it adaptable to a wide variety of situations
This chromium-vanadium steel tool features a rubber-coated handle for comfort and to help prevent slipping during use
cons: The tool is a little bulky at the ends, and it doesn't have a ratcheting mechanism, so it is not a good choice if you need to work in a tight area

customer_reviews.title: I received them in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased about 14 of these to give all the guys in my family for Christmas. They look like good quality and I will not know how well they work until the future, but i think they will be well used.
customer_reviews.author: Earlybird shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this thing, he carries it in the truck so he doesn't have to haul a bunch of tools everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: TorriB

customer_reviews.title: One tool for multiple task
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile tool to have. Has most of the sockets in metric and standard to complete the job.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Nuts and bolts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for just about all sizes of nuts and bolts. Easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: rmar

customer_reviews.title: Tool Box Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product Excellent customer service I had an issue with my purchase and they corrected the problem and worked with me very closely to ensure my satisfaction. I would recommend this for any tool box
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rindahl

customer_reviews.title: It is the only tool you need.
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it is the best tool he ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product and eliminates unnecessary tools
customer_reviews.text: It was very useful and kept me from using several tools
customer_reviews.author: Will Arrington

customer_reviews.title: a great piece to keep in a small tool box
customer_reviews.text: eliminates several pieces to save space in a small toolbox (car, for emergencies, etc)

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wrench
customer_reviews.text: This did not have a good grip socket to short I returned this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. It work well for what I want it to do. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Damion Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for a gift. Recipient was very pleased, said this was good quality and better than the existing one that he already had.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn A. Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The wrench arrived with missing metal screws and was siezed up. Back to amazon this goes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheezypoof

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Seems built solid, but somehow cheap. Ends don't rotate well (one is very hard, other is stuck in one place). Doesn't grip bolt heads cleanly, easily comes off head when using.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this item and I'll recommend it to my friends. A+
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this item and I'll recommend it to my friends. A+
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Great product,
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy not to have to locate the right part
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

product_meta.title: DFUTE Multi-Function Socket Wrench, 48-In-1 spanner, Tiger Wrench Works with Spline Bolts, Torx, Square Damaged Bolts, Adjustable Ratchet Wrench
feature_bullets: 【Applicable for Multiple Models】A socket wrench.8 sleeves correspond to 8 types of screws, works with Spline Bolts,5-point,6-Point,8-point12-Point,one can replace multiple.Can quickly repair tools.

【Easy to Use】well built and handy. 360 degree quick rotating heads,45 degree angle for hard to reach places.Good tool in emergency auto kit. Has most of the sockets in metric and standard to complete the job.
【Good Quality】The tool is solid and it’s heavy enough ,With CR-v Alloy steel material, safe to use. Rubber handle so your hand isn't constantly slipping.
【USE】For around the house it is perfect,for general construction great tool .that is designed to tackle all your projects around the house, or on the job!
【Note】It’s bulky, so it’s not going to work in tight places, but it works with a variety type of bolts
